name: Anita White
text: Never disappointed! Fas, friendly and delicious!

name: Brandon Nunez
text: Its a pretty good spot to stop by for pizza while scrolling around the city. Not to die for pizza but good. Service is okay. Bit slow but use to it in the city.

name: W Roane
text: In the middle of the road until I try the food.... Okay so I tried to pie here and it was pretty good... What I would like to add is the fact about price! This is a business in the center of VCU campus and they should take in consideration these are students and offer them a discount with student ID

name: Corey Love
text: The service was good, I would say the pizza is fairly average. The ingredients were cooked well so I was happy, the sauce wasn't great.

name: Daniel Thompson
text: I was excited to try this place. Unfortunately upon arrival my optimism went downhill fast. My experience was bad service and pizza that was not that great. They messed up my order so I had to wait longer for them to get it right and when …More

name: Danielle Reed
text: I just went to the West Broad Street location and they were closed. I called the number on the door and it was not in service. Pretty odd for 1PM on a Thursday. Is this location permanently closed?

name: Kira Haffner
text: Stopped by to have one of my favorite pizzas. This is still one of the best pizzas around this area. Great atmosphere and excellent customer service.

name: Felicia Nealy
text: My family and I were out of town visiting my niece and we needed a quick bite to eat so we went to Extreme Pizza. Great little pizza spot that had the best meatball sub that I have ever had.  The wings are really good too!

name: Leticia Smith
text: Awesome pizza at a great price. Nice thin crispy crust, tasty sauce and crispy pepperoni. Buy from this local business before you support some chain and let the money drain out of your community. I highly recommend this to any and all pizza lovers!

name: Hannah Lecky
text: We came to this place for the first time tonight and we are very disappointed. We ordered $29 worth of food and it was subpar. The food was NOT worth it. We am never coming back here. First off, the soda machine was out and when I told …More

name: charles Quarles
text: Very good pizza for 5 stars but some of the employees have smart mouths which deserves 1 star for people skills.

name: Chelsey Sperlazza
text: I love their individual pizzas! They are just to right size for me. Plus they make their own ranch dressing which is AMAZING! Don't expect a full sit down experience if that's what your looking for but if you want a quick bite definitely deserves a visit.

name: Ben Barnes
text: Really fresh pizza, and the staff is friendly. the personal pan is a good size. They we're also pretty quick getting it cooked as well.the ingredients tasted fresh I love how late their open

name: Melly
text: Normally the pizza is really good, but this time Saturday 12-30 we ordered pizza and wings. Pizza was just ok and I think it's b/c I was really hungry, otherwise I probably wouldn't have eaten it, and the wings were kinda soggy …More

name: Gussie Seng
text: Definitely worth the wait; If you are a pizza lover like myself, you must go here!I would definitely recommend stopping by here and trying their food.

name: Mary Jordan Siebert
text: It's alright. A bit overpriced for what you actually get. I still will go in, just wouldn't seek it out. I guess I should mention that I will go back, if I'm in the area...and it's during their "happy hour", when you get a dollar cheese slice. That's a pretty good size slice, definitely worth a dollar.

name: Always Bennï
text: Worst delivery experience ever. I ordered at 7:30 pm waiting and expecting I will be receiving two cal zones and a cheesecake, but instead I have to call three times asking where my order is each hour. Finally, at 10:30 pm the manager tells …More

name: Vasanth M Shanmugam
text: I love This place !!! The staff are always friendly and pay close attention to their customers wants and needs. The food is great, never a long wait , authentic and like no other!

name: Destiny B
text: Great place for a late night slice or a quick lunch.

name: Brian Kain
text: Best pizza on campus. Usually packed on basketball game night. I personally love the Everest, popped high with meat. The 8 inch is perfect for one. Expect it to be loud and busy.

name: Elizabeth Katie Anderson
text: Best. Pizza. Ever!!!  Loved the indian style pizza!  $1 PBRs

name: KR Shops
text: Omg their pizza is extremely delicious one try and your hooked. They also have some of the best vegan options available.  The staff is freindly and they have specials for college students as well.  This location is always clean and the …More

name: James Shields
text: I ordered from Extreme Pizza recently and had a pretty bad experience. I ordered and started waiting. After an hour and forty five minutes I called them to ask if there was an issue with the order. I was told it was on the way and should be …More

name: Alex Ratti
text: Hit or miss. Used to be more consistent, but recently they seem to be switching out the signature toppings with more cheese. Last couple times I got kicken chicken (Thai flavors) I struggled to find any of the advertised peanuts or carrots.

name: Neal Hambleton
text: I really like this place,  but I still can't understand why it's so difficult to get my order correct just once.   It's not big issues really except once.   But come on guys... no peppers is not hard.

name: Chris Nguyen
text: I walked into this place for a slice on a whim. I was sorely disappointed. The staff was perfectly nice, but the pizza I had was dry. The sauce on top was almost as if it had been dried off. Leaving just a red paste on top of the cracker …More

name: Rachel Perkinson
text: Pizza wasn't too terrible for a midnight craving, but pizza crust tasted like it had been cooked from frozen. Delivery also took nearly an hour and a half, but we ordered through eat street so maybe that slowed it down. Overall a very average experience and wouldn't recommend, at least not delivery.

name: Travis C.
text: Is this place permanently closed? 7p.m on a Monday and nothing.

name: Fill Riley
text: Great pizza, great calzones, wings are ok but all in all a great place with a great atmosphere

name: Brian Davis
text: A bit pricey for what ya get but the pizza isn't bad. If you're looking for late night pizza on the weekends, this is one of the only spots open so I guess you gotta pay a premium for that. Parking is difficult so get an Uber or be prepared to walk a few blocks

name: Risa Renae Harman
text: Tasty pizza and great for before or after ball game

name: Ursula Destefano
text: Nice and quick too, and the staff is nice.

name: Erik Bowe
text: Big pizza slices with generous toppings.  Great specials and outstanding staff.

name: Al Ed
text: I am a strong believer that there is no such thing as bad pizza, but Extreme Pizza was an extreme disappointment. The sauce and crust reminded me too much of the lunchables “build your own” pizza. The cheese just didn’t look right too. The …More

name: Tykisha Booker
text: I arrived at 1:15am on yesterday...the cashier was rude and abrupt.... the staff was HORRIBLE!!!!! one worker said "suck my di#k" to another coworker... fuc# you!!!! It was a mess!!!! As a parent of a child that's starting VCU this fall I …More

name: Colin Shomo
text: I don't really know what to say. It wasn't that extreme, and I usually order extreme things, given my crazy lifestyle. By that I mean I go for buffalo tendies, deluxe fries, supreme nachos, etc., hence making my lifestyle intense. On the plus side there was plenty of parmesan cheese.

name: N S
text: Great experience with this order. Ordered 2 pizzas online for delivery last night. Was informed it may take upto 1:15 hours, since it was Friday night.  But was pleasantly surprised when it arrived, still hot, in 45 minutes.  We got their …More

name: Lauren Cattley
text: Great topping combos/ creations

name: James Hunte
text: It's good pizza and pretty quick at lunch time.  I would definitely go there again.

name: Cannon West
text: Pretty decent pizza for a pretty decent price

name: Miranda Merbl
text: Probably some of the best pizza downtown Richmond can offer. Great prices, dope staff, and clean tables and bathrooms. This is the spot.

name: Jarmelle Jones
text: Place is not kid friendly. Vulgar language and   nasty attitude

name: E. La Monica
text: The crust is premade, the sauce is overly sweet and the cheese doesn't feel or taste even remotely like cheese. Maybe I made a mistake going for plain to start out but my friends didn't fare much better. With so many amazing places to eat …More

name: miriam tarabay
text: Ordered delivery, a 18" yard sale pizza which came with a free medium cheese pizza, $25. Ordered a sub, $8. The pizza was not all that, Mediocre. I like dominos pizza better for $8. The sub was better than the pizza, but pretty small. …More

name: benz981
text: I feel like extreme pizza has gone down hill in the last few years.  They used to be generous and awesome with the toppings, and I always felt like I got good value for the money.  Now I can really tell that "corporate" is mandating things …More

name: JaBari Scott
text: $1 slices from 2-4 is amazing and best deal in town!

name: Kaila Parker
text: Great place! I ordered the vegging out pizza here and didnt notice it came with pesto sauce. Unfortuately I had an allergic reaction and they allowed me to get a new pizza without the sauce free of charge. Very understanding people.

name: Michael Peters Jr.
text: Just one word describes this place best. Ewwww

name: Jacqueline Lee
text: always fresh good food even at 1:45 in the morning

name: Sol
text: Service is always good here.

name: John Bowden
text: Great pizza and better beer specials.

name: Valerie Boham
text: Best pizza in the world. Kinda pricey though!

name: Travis Cervantez
text: Quick pizzas! Like 7 bucks for any toppings and self serve beer! Awesome place!

name: Beryl McCarver
text: I order online got the wrong thing and if that wasn't enough the bread was not at all fresh. I will never order from them again.

name: bnreggie brown
text: The service was good and the pizza was out of this world! This ain't pizza hit or Dominos. Please go eat there. Lol

name: allante sm
text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had

name: Michelle Strohecker
text: Extreme Pizza is semi overrated by the college students. Their pizza takes a short time to make and the open kitchen helps you see the progress. Their dairy free cheese is a nice change for lactose intolerant people. I've seen many of the VCU basketball players eating there.

name: Abhinav Laxsav
text: You must try their Spice Route Pizza. One of the most flavorful Indian inspired pizzas.

name: Chelsea Boroughs
text: I used to eat here randomly throughout college, thought I'd give late night a try, estimated delivery time was 30 to 50 min... called 90 min later and while they tried to be accommodating the food was rush delivered about 10 min later and luke warm. Also wings are chicken nuggets with little to no seasoning.

name: Michelle Clogan
text: If I could give zero stars, I would. We regret ignoring the bad reviews. We began contacting them about 20 minutes after our delivery window from GrubHub (which is rarely exceeded). Each time we called, they said the delivery person would …More

name: Sharon Sweeney
text: Good food, Great atmosphere

name: Christy Alston
text: Ordered delivery...got my order in 30 minute...pizza was made just how I order and was still hot when I got it...also ordered the chef salad it was huge and very fresh

name: LaVaniel
text: Only been here once. The pizza was excellent. Love their variety. Looking forward to going back.

name: Dena M. Johnson
text: Looking for something from the norm i.e. Pizza Hut dominos this is the place. Great pies good service order the huge size u won't b disappointed

name: Shel Stoner
text: I ordered pizza today at literally 12:25 am. Guess what never showed up after repeated calls to the resturant? My pizza. I have paid  nearly 30$ for a pizza that has not showed up at my home. …More

name: Charlie Wade
text: The pizza was okay, certainly not $26.00 good, but what amazed me was the attitude the young lady had. Entering the establishment, there was no hello, how are you, not anything, and it wasn't like the place was crowded. Arriving @ the …More

name: Mike Easingwood
text: I have made several (6 to 10) orders in last 2 months. Half were wrong or not edible. Store even billed me to much on my card once for a order that was completely wrong. Save your money and stick with the big 3 pizza places. This place has a way to go before being Richmonds friend.

name: denise
text: Called at 2:30; was told I was too late to place an order. Thanks for the amazing customer service, hahahaa FAIL

name: Jorge Perez
text: 4 people working in there too slow

name: M. Prime
text: Great pizza, friendly staff, cozy setting.

name: Amy Heimbach
text: the  people do not stay open until they are supposed. When ordering, if the manager there does not  want to fill the order, because it is too big, then he will cancel the order.

name: Mr Official Whistle
text: The pizza was amazing

name: Mutt
text: There yard sale pizza is fantastic and the people there are super friendly! I like their boneless wings

text: Always Great Food,  Service is good
